actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution granting the consent of Congress to an amendment to the compact between the State of Ohio and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania relating to Pymatuning Lake.

summary.text: Interstate Compact - Grants the consent of Congress to an amendment to the compact between the State of Ohio and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania relating to Pymatuning Lake which allows boats equipped with a motor in excess of ten horsepower to be operated on such lake if the propeller is removed and left ashore.

titles.title: Joint resolution granting the consent of Congress to an amendment to the compact between the State of Ohio and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania relating to Pymatuning Lake.
